messages.content: ArtistoFlow is a powerful, all-in-one platform for digital artists that automates the process of preparing and submitting artwork to online marketplaces while providing valuable insights, resources, and collaboration tools.

npm install next react react-dom tailwindcss @reduxjs/toolkit react-redux next-auth axios react-toastify react-query express stripe pg pg-hstore sequelize sequelize-cli cors helmet cookie-parser bcrypt jsonwebtoken multer nodemailer dotenv sharp
Start by setting up the development environment, install dependencies, and then proceed to implement the features one by one, following the folder structure provided.

The key features of ArtistoFlow include user account management, image gallery, image editing and processing, mockup generation and customization, AI-assisted content generation, automated submission to online marketplaces, social media integration, analytics dashboard, in-app marketplace, collaboration tools, educational resources, and an affiliate program.

artisto-flow/{components/{Auth/{Login.js, Register.js, SocialLogin.js, ConfirmEmail.js}, Dashboard/{Analytics.js, ImageGallery.js, MockupGenerator.js, Marketplace.js}, Navigation/{Header.js, Footer.js}, Subscription/{SubscriptionCard.js, PaymentForm.js}, Collaboration/{ProjectList.js, Project.js, Feedback.js}, Shared/{Button.js, Input.js, Modal.js, Loader.js}}, pages/{_app.js, _document.js, index.js, dashboard.js, subscription.js, login.js, register.js, confirm-email.js, marketplace.js, collaboration.js, resources.js, affiliate.js}, public/{images/{logo.png, ...}, static/{css/{main.css}, js/{main.js}}}, styles/{global.css, tailwind.config.js}, lib/{api/{auth.js, images.js, mockups.js, subscriptions.js, marketplace.js, collaboration.js, analytics.js}, utils/{imageProcessing.js, mockupGeneration.js, contentGeneration.js, marketplaceIntegration.js, socialMediaIntegration.js}, middleware/{authMiddleware.js, rolesMiddleware.js}}, models/{User.js, Image.js, Mockup.js, Subscription.js, Marketplace.js, Collaboration.js, Affiliate.js}, services/{emailService.js}, next.config.js, package.json}

Login.js.instructions: Create a login component using Next.js and Next-Auth.

Register.js.instructions: Create a registration component using Next.js and Next-Auth.

SocialLogin.js.instructions: Create a social login component using Next.js and Next-Auth.

ConfirmEmail.js.instructions: Create a component for email confirmation using Next.js and Next-Auth.

Analytics.js.instructions: Create an analytics dashboard component using Next.js and React-Query.

ImageGallery.js.instructions: Create an image gallery component using Next.js and React-Query.

MockupGenerator.js.instructions: Create a mockup generator component using Next.js, React-Query, and Sharp.

Marketplace.js.instructions: Create an in-app marketplace component using Next.js and React-Query.

Header.js.instructions: Create a header component using Next.js and Tailwind CSS.

Footer.js.instructions: Create a footer component using Next.js and Tailwind CSS.

SubscriptionCard.js.instructions: Create a subscription card component using Next.js and Stripe.

PaymentForm.js.instructions: Create a payment form component using Next.js and Stripe.

ProjectList.js.instructions: Create a project list component for collaboration using Next.js and React-Query.

Project.js.instructions: Create an individual project component for collaboration using Next.js and React-Query.

Feedback.js.instructions: Create a feedback component for collaboration using Next.js and React-Query.

Button.js.instructions: Create a shared button component using Next.js and Tailwind CSS.

Input.js.instructions: Create a shared input component using Next.js and Tailwind CSS.

Modal.js.instructions: Create a shared modal component using Next.js and Tailwind CSS.

Loader.js.instructions: Create a shared loader component using Next.js and Tailwind CSS.

_app.js.instructions: Create a custom _app.js file using Next.js, Redux, and global styles.

_document.js.instructions: Create a custom _document.js file using Next.js for server-rendered styles.

index.js.instructions: Create the landing page using Next.js and Tailwind CSS.

dashboard.js.instructions: Create the dashboard page using Next.js and the Dashboard components.

subscription.js.instructions: Create the subscription page using Next.js and the Subscription components.

login.js.instructions: Create the login page using Next.js and the Auth components.

register.js.instructions: Create the registration page using Next.js and the Auth components.

confirm-email.js.instructions: Create the email confirmation page using Next.js and the Auth components.

marketplace.js.instructions: Create the in-app marketplace page using Next.js and the Marketplace component.

collaboration.js.instructions: Create the collaboration page using Next.js and the Collaboration components.

resources.js.instructions: Create the educational resources page using Next.js and Tailwind CSS.

affiliate.js.instructions: Create the affiliate program page using Next.js and Tailwind CSS.

logo.png.instructions: Add the logo image for the website.

main.css.instructions: Create a main CSS file for global styles.

main.js.instructions: Create a main JavaScript file for global scripts.

global.css.instructions: Create a global CSS file for custom styles.

tailwind.config.js.instructions: Create a Tailwind CSS configuration file.

auth.js.instructions: Create an API module for authentication using Next-Auth.

images.js.instructions: Create an API module for handling image uploads and management.

mockups.js.instructions: Create an API module for generating and managing mockups.

subscriptions.js.instructions: Create an API module for managing user subscriptions.

marketplace.js.instructions: Create an API module for the in-app marketplace.

collaboration.js.instructions: Create an API module for collaboration features.

analytics.js.instructions: Create an API module for analytics.

imageProcessing.js.instructions: Create a utility module for image processing.

mockupGeneration.js.instructions: Create a utility module for mockup generation.

contentGeneration.js.instructions: Create a utility module for content generation using ChatGPT-4.

marketplaceIntegration.js.instructions: Create a utility module for integration with online marketplaces.

socialMediaIntegration.js.instructions: Create a utility module for social media integration.

authMiddleware.js.instructions: Create authentication middleware for protected routes.

rolesMiddleware.js.instructions: Create a roles-based middleware for user access control.

User.js.instructions: Create a User model using Sequelize.

Image.js.instructions: Create an Image model using Sequelize.

Mockup.js.instructions: Create a Mockup model using Sequelize.

Subscription.js.instructions: Create a Subscription model using Sequelize.

Marketplace.js.instructions: Create a Marketplace model using Sequelize.

Collaboration.js.instructions: Create a Collaboration model using Sequelize.

Affiliate.js.instructions: Create an Affiliate model using Sequelize.

emailService.js.instructions: Create an email service module using Nodemailer.

package.json.instructions: Create a package.json file with the list of dependencies used in this project.

README.md.instructions: Create a README.md file with the project description, parameters, usage instructions, examples, target audience, and license.
